catalog_script_client.name: OA Price Variable

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_c2210eda1b0fd510cc9efdd2cd4bcb90
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>true</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="OA 신청서">d3c506e887fedd104bba40c6cebb3538</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:73c39dde1b0bd510cc9efdd2cd4bcb65</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>OA Price Variable </name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
		return;
	}

	//Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below

	var price = g_form.getValue('currency');
	price = price.trim();
	
	// first character should be dollar sign
	var firstChar = price.substring(0,1);
	if (firstChar != '$') {
		alert ("Please enter cost in $0.00 format");
		g_form.setValue("currency", oldValue);
		return;
	}
	// characters after the $ sign should be numerics
	var costType = isNaN(price.substring(1));
	if (costType == true) {
		alert ("Please enter cost in $0.00 format");
		g_form.setValue("currency", oldValue);
		return;
	}

	// entered value should have a decimal point
	var num = price.substring(1);
	if (num.indexOf('.') == -1) {
		alert ("Please enter cost in $0.00 format");
		g_form.setValue("currency", oldValue);
		return;
	}
	// there must be 2 digits only after the decimal
	var decNum = num.substring(num.indexOf('.')+1, num.length);
	if (decNum.length != 2) {
		alert ("Please enter cost in $0.00 format");
		g_form.setValue("currency", oldValue);
		return;
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-11-11 04:16:41</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>c2210eda1b0fd510cc9efdd2cd4bcb90</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>OA Price Variable </sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Office Automation" source="x_tigar_office_a_0">d4c3699a876691104bba40c6cebb3598</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Office Automation">d4c3699a876691104bba40c6cebb3598</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_c2210eda1b0fd510cc9efdd2cd4bcb90</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-11-11 04:25:41</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
